name: oci
description: Open Citation Identifier (OCI) for the citation.

name: citing
description: The DOI of the citing entity.

name: cited
description: The DOI of the cited entity.

name: creation
description: The creation date of the citation (i.e. the publication date of the citing entity).

name: timespan
description: The time span of the citation (i.e. the interval between the publication date of the cited entity and the publication date of the citing entity).

name: journal_sc
description: Whether the citation is a journal self-citations (i.e. the citing and the cited entities are published in the same journal).

name: author_sc
description: The citation is an author self-citation (i.e. the citing and the cited entities have at least one author in common).
